titles: The psalme of mercy, or, A meditation vpon the 51. psalme by a true penitent.
author: I. B.
Bate, John.
Bennet, John, Sir, d. 1627.
publisher: Imprinted by Felix Kyngston, and are to be sold by Matthew Lownes,
